Prep:
Load the film into the development tank.
Decide on development times by referring to www.digitaltruth.com App Settings:
On the Develop screen, select your film and chemicals.
Note that you cannot pause a chemical reaction, so be prepared to complete the entire process before clicking Start. Development Steps:
Set the timer, pour in Developer, and click start.

When notified, agitate chemistry by inverting the development tank 3-4 times.

When the timer stops, pour the Developer into the storage container.

Set the timer according to Stop Bath label instructions, pour in the Stop Bath, and start the timer.

When the timer stops, pour the Stop Bath back into the storage container.

Set the timer according to Fixer label instructions, pour in Fixer, and start the timer.

When notified, agitate chemistry by inverting the development tank 3-4 times.

When the timer stops, pour the Fixer back into the storage container.

Remove the lid of the development tank and rinse thoroughly with clean water.

Hang up film to dry. You’re done!
